snippet.title: Total Chaos | Gameplay Preview | Play the Demo Now!
snippet.description:
FREE Demo on Steam: ► http://PlayTotalChaos.com
Total Chaos, a brutal survival horror experience, immerses players in the decayed remnants of Fort Oasis, a long-abandoned mining colony where reality bends and nightmares take shape. For those daring enough, Total Chaos: VR Edition will be included with the base game, bringing terror even closer.

🩸 A Lost Island. A Desperate Fight for Survival. A Descent into Madness.

Stranded at sea, a wayward Coast Guardsman washes ashore on the haunted ruins of Fort Oasis. A mysterious voice crackles through a walkie-talkie, urging you deeper into the fog-laden streets. But as hallucinations grow stronger and reality distorts, one question lingers—can it be trusted?

💀 Unrelenting Abominations – Face grotesque human-monster hybrids that watch, learn, and adapt to your every move. Move unpredictably, or risk becoming prey.
🕯️ A Warped Reality – As Madness takes hold, walls shift, hidden passageways appear, and hallucinations blur the line between salvation and doom.
🩸 Scavenge & Improvise – Search abandoned apartments, crumbling facilities, and eerie graveyards for scrap to craft makeshift weapons like axes, pipe wrenches, and molotovs.
🎯 Every Bullet Counts – Firearms are scarce, and every shot matters. Choose your weapons wisely, or suffer the consequences.
🎒 Limited Inventory, Maximum Fear – A weighted inventory system forces hard choices—hoard supplies and risk slowing down, or take only what’s necessary to survive.

🔻 Total Chaos Expands After Launch

🕯️ Epilogue DLC – An all-new post-launch expansion will introduce a never-before-seen tenth chapter, extended narrative, and new locations.
🎭 Total Chaos: VR Edition – Step into Fort Oasis in full VR and experience survival horror through the eyes of the Coast Guardsman.

Prepare to face the horrors of Total Chaos. Wishlist now on Steam and survive... If you can.

DISCORD: ► https://discord.gg/apogee
X / TWITTER: ► https://twitter.com/apogee_ent
THREADS: ► https://threads.net/apogeeentertainment
BLUESKY: ►https://bsky.app/profile/apogeeent.com
INSTAGRAM: ► https://www.instagram.com/apogeeentertainment/
FACEBOOK: ► https://www.facebook.com/ApogeeEntertainment
TIKTOK: ► https://www.tiktok.com/@apogeeentertainment

Video Credits:
Directed by: Sam Prebble
Produced by: Sam Prebble & Jeron Moore
Edited by: Sam Prebble & Kyle Blessing
Music Composed by: Mathieu Hallouin & Tim Stoney
Executive Producer: Jeron Moore
Special Thanks: Scott Miller 

#TotalChaos
